title: Cognitive Load Theory-Based Mathematics Project Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts (algebra, geometry, functions)
context.additional_context: Emphasis on collaborative learning and stepwise problem-solving activities using smartphones

learning_goals: Learners can systematically solve complex mathematical problems by decomposing them into three or more steps
Learners can apply strategies to manage cognitive load in team-based projects with over 80% accuracy
Learners can create explanatory materials that incorporate cognitive architecture principles into project deliverables

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
